this_title: In and out of the kitchen Season 1
introduction: The show stars Miles Jupp, Justin Edwards, Brendan Dempsey, Selina Cadell, Philip Fox and Ade Oyefoso and is currently being considered by BBC executives.The half-hour pilot was directed by Absolutely Fabulous and Stella director Mandie Fletcher.Written by Miles Jupp, the show focuses on cookery writer Damien Trench, who lives in Queen's Park with his partner Anthony.The radio series is told through entries from Damien's diary.
foreign_title: In and out of the kitchen Season 1
